title: Create DynamicInput component with chip-in-input UX
description:
Create a new input component for dynamic detail-gathering screens.

File to create: app/fo-04/components/dynamic-input.tsx

Component requirements:
1. Text input field that can contain both free text AND chip tags
2. Chip tags inside input show with - or x for removal
3. Below input: suggestion chips with + prefix
4. 'Show more' button to expand additional chips
5. Value is combination of text + selected chips
6. Disabled 'Next' button until text or chip present

Props interface:
- reflectiveStatement: string (may be empty)
- question: string
- initialChips: string[]
- expandedChips: string[]
- value: { text: string; selectedChips: string[] }
- onChange: (value) => void
- onContinue: () => void
- isLoading?: boolean

Use Framer Motion for animations like FO-03 components.
acceptance_criteria: Component renders with test data showing: question text, input field, chips with + prefix, show more button; clicking chip adds it to input as tag
closed_reason: Created DynamicInput component with chip-in-input UX, + prefix chips, inline tag removal, and validation
